summary: Completed testing of RL (DQN, PPO) and Multi-Model Ensemble features. All 14 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend Training page correctly shows new model options with proper configuration panels. AI Advisor chat still works after code changes.
context_for_next_testing_agent: RL and Multi-Model features are fully implemented. Training page shows 12 model types including rl_dqn, rl_ppo, and multi_model. When RL models are selected, the Advanced Options tab shows RL Configuration panel with Training Episodes and Discount Factor sliders. When Multi-Model is selected, it shows model selection checkboxes (LSTM, GRU, Transformer, CNN_LSTM) and ensemble method dropdown.

backend_tests.test: RL models import (RLTrainer, DQNAgent, PPOAgent, build_rl_model)
Supported models list (lstm, gru, transformer, cnn_lstm)
Ensemble methods list (voting, weighted, stacking, blending)

frontend_tests.test: RL - DQN option visible in Network Architecture
RL - PPO option visible in Network Architecture
Multi-Model option visible in Network Architecture
RL Configuration panel appears when RL model selected
Training Episodes slider in RL config
Discount Factor slider in RL config
Multi-Model Ensemble Configuration panel appears when Multi-Model selected
Model selection checkboxes (LSTM, GRU, Transformer, CNN_LSTM)

mocked_apis.note: Data fetching uses public APIs, not user's authenticated exchange keys

rl_dqn.name: RL - DQN
rl_dqn.description: Deep Q-Network - Learns by trading simulation
